body.name: Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge Duo, Makeup Blending Sponge, For Foundation, Offers Light To Medium Coverage, Natural, Dewy Makeup, Orange Sponge, Latex-Free Foam, 2 Count
features: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge creates an even, natural glow to help dull, tired skin
Our #1 makeup blending sponge provides light to medium coverage
Use the MCS with liquid and cream products such as foundations, skin tints, tinted moisturizers, and bb creams
The Miracle Complexion Sponge also works to blend liquid and cream blush, bronzer, and highlight for a seamless look
Use Real Technique’s MCS damp for best results
body.description: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge flawlessly blends liquid and cream products with ease for a streak-free, luminous glow. Our #1 makeup blending sponge offers a natural, dewy finish, and its micro-fine pores help create a seamless base with light to medium coverage. Real Technique’s MCS works best with liquid and cream makeup products such as foundation, skin tints, and illuminators. This makeup sponge has RT's unique 3-point application technique that makes blending products seamless. First use the flat edge of the MCS to pack on product, then the precision tip to conceal, and finally, blend it all out with the rounded side. Use it damp for extra dewiness and let that inner glow shine through. The Miracle Complexion Sponge is easy to clean using our Real Techniques Brush + Sponge Cleansing Gel. It’s also 100% cruelty-free, vegan, and designed with revolutionary latex-free foam technology. We are Real Techniques, the brand of choice for all makeup users, no matter your level of expertise. Created in collaboration with leading makeup artists, we aspire to take the mystery out of choosing beauty tools so you can focus more time on putting your best face forward one blend at a time. From full makeup looks, to quick beauty hacks, RT brushes + sponges are exceptionally high quality for professional looking results every time. BUT… don’t be fooled by our affordable prices, RT tools are award-winning + purposefully designed because that’s what you deserve. Quality without compromise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge Duo - A Makeup Miracle in Every Blend!
reviews.reviewText: Attention all makeup enthusiasts and beauty aficionados - prepare to experience a makeup miracle with the Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge Duo! This blending sponge is not just any ordinary tool; it's a game-changer that offers flawless, natural, and dewy makeup results!Firstly, the "Miracle Complexion Sponge" is like a magic wand for makeup application. It's like this sponge knows exactly how to blend foundation seamlessly, leaving your skin looking flawless and ready for the spotlight!The "Makeup Blending Sponge" feature is more than just a blending tool; it's like this sponge is an artist's brush, creating a canvas of perfection on your skin with every stroke!But here's the real magic - the "Light to Medium Coverage" is like a veil of perfection. It's like this sponge can transform any foundation into a dreamy, buildable coverage that feels weightless and looks natural!The "Orange Sponge" color is like a burst of sunshine. It's like using this sponge is like a wake-up call for your makeup routine, infusing your face with a radiant and dewy finish that turns heads!The "Packaging May Vary" is more than just a disclaimer; it's like a surprise party for your beauty collection! You never know which packaging you'll get, making each purchase a delightful surprise!In conclusion, the Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge Duo is a makeup miracle in every blend that deserves a glowing review! If you're a makeup enthusiast seeking flawless and dewy results, this blending sponge is an essential addition to your beauty arsenal! Real Techniques, you've created a makeup miracle with this sponge duo! Bravo for adding a touch of magic and flawless application to our makeup routine! May this sponge continue to blend our way to beauty perfection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking for a blending sponge? LOOK NO FURTHER!
reviews.reviewText: If you're anything like me, you care about your make up not looking caked on and fake. I'm relatively new to the latest makeup trends, but it became very evident to me that a blending sponge is a must have in the daily essentials kit. I'm also the type of online shopper who reads the reviews before making a purchase, especially when it comes to something that is going to touch my face.The RT sponge is just wonderful! Allow me to break it down for you:First, let's talk price: In comparison to the BeautyBlender (because I'm sure you know about it) this sponge is significantly less expensive, I believe the BeautyBlender hovers around $20 where the RT sponge was just under $10. Don't be fooled however, the RT sponge may be short on cash, but it is not short on performance.Size: The RT sponge is rather large, about the size of a small(er) lemon. However, the size assures you that you will get optimum coverage, and I think contributes to the flawless finish.Material: The material of the RealTechniques Sponge reminds me of a memory foam pillow. It's soft to the touch and smooth on the skin. Simply wonderful. The sponge does expand some when it is wet, but not too much. For me, it was just enough! Wetting the sponge contributes to the dewey look I prefer, a vibrant, fresh skin, natural look. One thing I have to say about the RT sponge is it seems to hold water a bit. This isn't a terrible thing, I'd simply recommend allowing it to dry overnight (after cleaning) if you need to use the sponge dry.Shape: The sponge is shaped like a lemon, with one flat, angled edge. The rounded edges are great for blending in foundation on the cheeks or larger areas, where the flat edge is perfect for blending in concealer or areas around the eyes and nose. There's a pointed tip at one end, which is suggested for blending in blemish control (small precise spots).In regard to some of the negative reviews, I can see how the edges of the sponge may fray with a significant amount of use, however, I think it's all about how well you treat your sponge. If you leave it laying around, or banging in the bottom of your cosmetic case, it's going to rip. If you keep it safely in your beauty bag, I think the lifespan of this sponge could really surprise you.All in all, this sponge seems to be fantastic,it really does deliver a flawless finish.L

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using these sponges for years. Reasonably priced and good quality. They last me a very long time for each sponge and they are easy to wash.Very soft. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of my favorite beauty sponges.
reviews.reviewText: I've had the beauty blender brand sponges and this is by far my favorite one. It blends my concealer and foundation beautifully and effortlessly.
